abstract: As with AOL in another era, Facebook’s deals with sellers of things like phones and Blu-ray discs are a sign that it is more than a flash in the pan.
snippet: As with AOL in another era, Facebook’s deals with sellers of things like phones and Blu-ray discs are a sign that it is more than a flash in the pan.
lead_paragraph: Facebook is becoming more like AOL. And I mean that in a good way.

headline.main: Facebook’s Very Long Path to Oblivion
